stl

Class Solid

  • java.lang.Object
    • stl.Solid

  • public class Solid
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a StL ASCII Format solid. A 3D object that is composed of multiple Facet
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nguyen Gia Khanh Ho CST8132

    • Method Detail

      • addFacet

        public boolean addFacet(Facet facet)
        This method adds Facet to facets list
        Parameters:
        facet - The facet added to the facets list
        Returns:
        True if the facet is added successfully, false if not

      • addFacet

        public boolean addFacet(Vertex... vertices)
        This method takes a variable number of Vertex and creates Facet and add them to the Solid
        Parameters:
        vertices - A variable argument that takes multiple vertexes to create Facet
        Returns:
        True if successfully add Facet to the Solid, false if the number of Vertexes less than or equal 2 vertexes

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method creates a String of the solid specified in the StL ASCII Format
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String of the solid

      • print

        public void print(java.io.PrintWriter printWriter)
        This method prints the Solid to a file
        Parameters:
        printWriter - The file taking the Solid
